33 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
34 PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::PiercedStorageRange()
35  : PiercedKernelRange<id_t>(),
36  m_begin(), m_end()
37 {
38 }
39 
45 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
46 PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::PiercedStorageRange(storage_t *storage)
47 {
48  initialize(storage);
49 }
50 
58 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
59 PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::PiercedStorageRange(storage_t *storage, id_t first, id_t last)
60 {
61  initialize(storage, first, last);
62 }
63 
70 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
71 PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::PiercedStorageRange(const iterator &begin, const iterator &end)
72 {
73  initialize(begin, end);
74 }
75 
81 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
82 void PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::initialize(const storage_t *storage)
83 {
84  PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::initialize(&(storage->getKernel()));
85 
86  m_begin = storage->begin();
87  m_end = storage->end();
88 }
89 
97 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
98 void PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::initialize(const storage_t *storage, id_t first, id_t last)
99 {
100  PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::initialize(&(storage->getKernel()), first, last);
101 
102  m_begin = storage->find(first);
103  m_end = ++(storage->find(last));
104 }
105 
112 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
113 void PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::initialize(const iterator &begin, const iterator &end)
114 {
115  if (&(begin.getStorage()) != &(end.getStorage())) {
116  throw std::runtime_error("The two iterators belong to different storages");
117  }
118 
119  PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::initialize(begin.getKernelIterator(), end.getKernelIterator());
120 
121  m_begin = begin;
122  m_end = end;
123 }
124 
131 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
132 void PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::swap(PiercedStorageRange &other) noexcept
133 {
134  PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::swap(other);
135 
136  std::swap(m_begin, other.m_begin);
137  std::swap(m_end, other.m_end);
138 }
139 
145 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
146 const PiercedKernelRange<id_t> & PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::getKernelRange() const
147 {
148  return static_cast<const PiercedKernelRange<id_t> &>(*this);
149 }
150 
156 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
157 template<typename U, typename U_no_cv,
158  typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<U, U_no_cv>::value, int>::type>
159 typename PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::iterator PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::begin() noexcept
160 {
161  return m_begin;
162 }
163 
171 template<typename value_t, typename id_t, typename value_no_cv_t>
172 template<typename U, typename U_no_cv,
173  typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<U, U_no_cv>::value, int>::type>
174 typename PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::iterator PiercedStorageRange<value_t, id_t, value_no_cv_t>::end() noexcept
175 {
176  return m_end;
177 }

186 {
187  return m_begin;
188 }

bitpit::PiercedKernelRange
The PiercedKernelRange allow to iterate using range-based loops over a PiercedStorage.
